alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 30 at 6:31PM EST until December 30 at 6:45PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Tornado Warning for... West central Dodge County in central Georgia... East central Pulaski County in central Georgia... * Until 645 PM EST. * At 630 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Baileys Park, or 8 miles southeast of Hawkinsville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Eastman and Gresston. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
